fields.name: yay
fields.fieldText:
You've made sure the Billing Address, Shipping Address and Shipping Contact are filled out.You can View Opportunity


Please refresh the browser, it can take up to 5 minutes for the Sales Tax amount to show up on the opportunity. If you do not see a status of Sales Tax Current after 5 minutes, please contact SalesOps at salesops@samsara.com

fields.name: OppStage
fields.fieldText: The Opportunity Stage must be in Decision or higher in order to calculate Sales tax.

fields.name: CurrentStage
fields.fieldText: The current stage of the Opportunity is {!curOpp.StageName}

fields.name: rerun_sales_tax
fields.helpText: If you do not check rerun sales tax, sales tax will not be recalculated.

fields.name: Text20
fields.fieldText: Check the 'Rerun Sales Tax' box if you would like to rerun the sales tax for this opportunity. Sales tax will not be recalculated if this box is not checked.

fields.name: Text14
fields.fieldText:
The Opportunity Stage must be in Decision or higher in order to calculate Sales tax.


The current stage of the Opportunity is {!curOpp.StageName}

fields.name: Rerun_Sales_Tax2
fields.helpText: If you do not check rerun sales tax, sales tax will not be recalculated.

fields.name: Text15
fields.fieldText: Check the 'Rerun Sales Tax' box if you would like to rerun the sales tax for this opportunity. Sales tax will not be recalculated if this box is not checked.
